data.message: Dear Facebook, you have been ignoring my messages for 3 weeks now. My wife's account was disabled over posting to a sales group. She immediately responded with a copy of her ID and other information you requested. There has been absolutely no response from Facebook on this matter. You have ignored every message she sent you, and you are now doing the same to me. Can you please get this sorted out?

replies.message: Hi Velimir. If your wife has submitted an appeal, please hang tight while we take the time to review it. Thanks for your patience! -Stephanie
Facebook how long do the appeals generally take? This one said it will take no more than 72 hours...3 weeks ago!
i was sick so I  can,t give you replay
